rules:
[Ø] Taikoku
[1] We'll establish this head on, only expect respect if you're giving respect. No admin on the team should automatically be required to receive respect unless it's met equally.
[2] Don't touch my tomatoes.
[3] Don't have a sense of using a power with the 'omni' prefix. Or anything absurdly god-powerful.
[4] Expect death naturally if you do anything that would naturally kill someone but doesn't. That is unless you have enhanced durability abilities that allows you to survive extreme conditions.
[5] Expect at least some moderation of a police/authority force in reaction to your characters. Players are allowed to play as NPCs as they see fit, as long as they do not pose significant roles such as a Police Chief or anything of the sort.
[6] WHAT ARE YOU DOING WITH THAT BABY?
[7] IF YOU'RE GOING TO FIST ANDROID GIRLS, DO IT PROUDLY.
[8] Urban dictionary every word you don't know and post it publicly. Doesn't matter if NSFW, make sure you say it is before posting it.
[9] Be sure to check Gun Regulations in the Database if you consider wanting firearms for your characters if you find it necessary.
[10] Everyone who pretty much joins the server joins on a new slate. This doesn't imply ICly only, but also OOCly. Breaking this without consent from admins or a majority of the server will result in me being able to dropkick you.
